messages.subject: An introduction
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there everyone!  I m really excited about the opportunity to exchange ideas and to gain feedback about natural learning and parenting.  I live in
messages.messageBody: Hi there everyone! I'm really excited about the opportunity to exchange ideas and to gain feedback about natural learning and parenting. I live in Murfreesboro, TN. My children are Hunter, 5.5, Ronin, nearly 4, and Drayken, 7.5 months. I'm married to Michael who is a swordfighting and fencing instructor. We run a small raw vegan chocolate business and are very passionate about health and nutrition. We are not vegans but we prefer to eat dairy free and sugar free. I run a non-profit organization called Artsy Mamas and I love to blog at www.bonafidemama.com. You are welcome to go there and friend me on facebook. Can't wait to get to know all of you amazing moms and dads.
